name: spruce-mercury-workspace
description: All the tools you need to connect to a Mercury compatible API. ğŸ’¥

scripts.clean.build: for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.build; cd ../..; done
scripts.clean.dependencies: rm -rf node_modules/ yarn.lock && for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.dependencies; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages: yarn add -D lerna -W ; for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; spruce upgrade; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages.only: yarn add -D lerna -W ; for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; spruce upgrade.dependencies; cd ../..; done
